    <a href="https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/aleks-p/multiplayer-collaborative-editing-database">
       Collaborative editing for your app. <strong>Support on Kickstarter!</strong>
    </a>

  üëç react-use    
============

<sup>  
  
[![npm\ package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/react-use.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-use)\ [![CircleCI\ master](https://img.shields.io/circleci/project/github/streamich/react-use/master.svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/streamich/react-use)\ [![npm\ downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/react-use.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-use)\ [![demos](https://img.shields.io/badge/demos-üöÄ-yellow.svg)](http://streamich.github.io/react-use)  
Collection\ of\ essential\ [React\ Hooks](https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-intro.html).\ *Port\ of*\ [`libreact`](https://github.com/streamich/libreact).  
Translations:\ [üá®üá≥\ Ê±âËØ≠](https://github.com/zenghongtu/react-use-chinese/blob/master/README.md)</sup>  
  
  
  

    npm i react-use

  
  
  
  
  

-   [**Sensors**](./docs/Sensors.md)
    -   [`useBattery`](./docs/useBattery.md) ‚Äî tracks device battery state. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/qlvn662zww)
    -   [`useGeolocation`](./docs/useGeolocation.md) ‚Äî tracks geo location state of user‚Äôs device. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usegeolocation--demo)
    -   [`useHover` and `useHoverDirty`](./docs/useHover.md) ‚Äî tracks mouse hover state of some element. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/zpn583rvx)
    -   [`useHash`](./docs/useHash.md) ‚Äî tracks location hash value. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usehash--demo)
    -   [`useIdle`](./docs/useIdle.md) ‚Äî tracks whether user is being inactive.
    -   [`useIntersection`](./docs/useIntersection.md) ‚Äî tracks an HTML element‚Äôs intersection. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-useintersection--demo)
    -   [`useKey`](./docs/useKey.md), [`useKeyPress`](./docs/useKeyPress.md), [`useKeyboardJs`](./docs/useKeyboardJs.md), and [`useKeyPressEvent`](./docs/useKeyPressEvent.md) ‚Äî track keys. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usekeypressevent--demo)
    -   [`useLocation`](./docs/useLocation.md) and [`useSearchParam`](./docs/useSearchParam.md) ‚Äî tracks page navigation bar location state.
    -   [`useLongPress`](./docs/useLongPress.md) ‚Äî tracks long press gesture of some element.
    -   [`useMedia`](./docs/useMedia.md) ‚Äî tracks state of a CSS media query. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usemedia--demo)
    -   [`useMediaDevices`](./docs/useMediaDevices.md) ‚Äî tracks state of connected hardware devices.
    -   [`useMotion`](./docs/useMotion.md) ‚Äî tracks state of device‚Äôs motion sensor.
    -   [`useMouse` and `useMouseHovered`](./docs/useMouse.md) ‚Äî tracks state of mouse position. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usemouse--docs)
    -   [`useMouseWheel`](./docs/useMouseWheel.md) ‚Äî tracks deltaY of scrolled mouse wheel. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usemousewheel--docs)
    -   [`useNetworkState`](./docs/useNetworkState.md) ‚Äî tracks the state of browser‚Äôs network connection. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usenetworkstate--demo)
    -   [`useOrientation`](./docs/useOrientation.md) ‚Äî tracks state of device‚Äôs screen orientation.
    -   [`usePageLeave`](./docs/usePageLeave.md) ‚Äî triggers when mouse leaves page boundaries.
    -   [`useScratch`](./docs/useScratch.md) ‚Äî tracks mouse click-and-scrub state.
    -   [`useScroll`](./docs/useScroll.md) ‚Äî tracks an HTML element‚Äôs scroll position. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usescroll--docs)
    -   [`useScrolling`](./docs/useScrolling.md) ‚Äî tracks whether HTML element is scrolling.
    -   [`useStartTyping`](./docs/useStartTyping.md) ‚Äî detects when user starts typing.
    -   [`useWindowScroll`](./docs/useWindowScroll.md) ‚Äî tracks `Window` scroll position. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usewindowscroll--docs)
    -   [`useWindowSize`](./docs/useWindowSize.md) ‚Äî tracks `Window` dimensions. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/m7ln22668)
    -   [`useMeasure`](./docs/useMeasure.md) and [`useSize`](./docs/useSize.md) ‚Äî tracks an HTML element‚Äôs dimensions. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usemeasure--demo)
    -   [`createBreakpoint`](./docs/createBreakpoint.md) ‚Äî tracks `innerWidth`
    -   [`useScrollbarWidth`](./docs/useScrollbarWidth.md) ‚Äî detects browser‚Äôs native scrollbars width. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/sensors-usescrollbarwidth--demo)  
          
-   [**UI**](./docs/UI.md)
    -   [`useAudio`](./docs/useAudio.md) ‚Äî plays audio and exposes its controls. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/2o4lo6rqy)
    -   [`useClickAway`](./docs/useClickAway.md) ‚Äî triggers callback when user clicks outside target area.
    -   [`useCss`](./docs/useCss.md) ‚Äî dynamically adjusts CSS.
    -   [`useDrop` and `useDropArea`](./docs/useDrop.md) ‚Äî tracks file, link and copy-paste drops.
    -   [`useFullscreen`](./docs/useFullscreen.md) ‚Äî display an element or video full-screen. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/ui-usefullscreen--demo)
    -   [`useSlider`](./docs/useSlider.md) ‚Äî provides slide behavior over any HTML element. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/ui-useslider--demo)
    -   [`useSpeech`](./docs/useSpeech.md) ‚Äî synthesizes speech from a text string. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/n090mqz69m)
    -   [`useVibrate`](./docs/useVibrate.md) ‚Äî provide physical feedback using the [Vibration API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Vibration_API). [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/ui-usevibrate--demo)
    -   [`useVideo`](./docs/useVideo.md) ‚Äî plays video, tracks its state, and exposes playback controls. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/ui-usevideo--demo)  
          
-   [**Animations**](./docs/Animations.md)
    -   [`useRaf`](./docs/useRaf.md) ‚Äî re-renders component on each `requestAnimationFrame`.
    -   [`useInterval`](./docs/useInterval.md) and [`useHarmonicIntervalFn`](./docs/useHarmonicIntervalFn.md) ‚Äî re-renders component on a set interval using `setInterval`.
    -   [`useSpring`](./docs/useSpring.md) ‚Äî interpolates number over time according to spring dynamics.
    -   [`useTimeout`](./docs/useTimeout.md) ‚Äî re-renders component after a timeout.
    -   [`useTimeoutFn`](./docs/useTimeoutFn.md) ‚Äî calls given function after a timeout. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/animation-usetimeoutfn--demo)
    -   [`useTween`](./docs/useTween.md) ‚Äî re-renders component, while tweening a number from 0 to 1. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/52990wwzyl)
    -   [`useUpdate`](./docs/useUpdate.md) ‚Äî returns a callback, which re-renders component when called.  
          
-   [**Side-effects**](./docs/Side-effects.md)
    -   [`useAsync`](./docs/useAsync.md), [`useAsyncFn`](./docs/useAsyncFn.md), and [`useAsyncRetry`](./docs/useAsyncRetry.md) ‚Äî resolves an `async` function.
    -   [`useBeforeUnload`](./docs/useBeforeUnload.md) ‚Äî shows browser alert when user try to reload or close the page.
    -   [`useCookie`](./docs/useCookie.md) ‚Äî provides way to read, update and delete a cookie. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/side-effects-usecookie--demo)
    -   [`useCopyToClipboard`](./docs/useCopyToClipboard.md) ‚Äî copies text to clipboard.
    -   [`useDebounce`](./docs/useDebounce.md) ‚Äî debounces a function. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/side-effects-usedebounce--demo)
    -   [`useError`](./docs/useError.md) ‚Äî error dispatcher. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/side-effects-useerror--demo)
    -   [`useFavicon`](./docs/useFavicon.md) ‚Äî sets favicon of the page.
    -   [`useLocalStorage`](./docs/useLocalStorage.md) ‚Äî manages a value in `localStorage`.
    -   [`useLockBodyScroll`](./docs/useLockBodyScroll.md) ‚Äî lock scrolling of the body element.
    -   [`useRafLoop`](./docs/useRafLoop.md) ‚Äî calls given function inside the RAF loop.
    -   [`useSessionStorage`](./docs/useSessionStorage.md) ‚Äî manages a value in `sessionStorage`.
    -   [`useThrottle` and `useThrottleFn`](./docs/useThrottle.md) ‚Äî throttles a function. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/side-effects-usethrottle--demo)
    -   [`useTitle`](./docs/useTitle.md) ‚Äî sets title of the page.
    -   [`usePermission`](./docs/usePermission.md) ‚Äî query permission status for browser APIs.  
          
-   [**Lifecycles**](./docs/Lifecycles.md)
    -   [`useEffectOnce`](./docs/useEffectOnce.md) ‚Äî a modified [`useEffect`](https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-reference.html#useeffect) hook that only runs once.
    -   [`useEvent`](./docs/useEvent.md) ‚Äî subscribe to events.
    -   [`useLifecycles`](./docs/useLifecycles.md) ‚Äî calls `mount` and `unmount` callbacks.
    -   [`useMountedState`](./docs/useMountedState.md) and [`useUnmountPromise`](./docs/useUnmountPromise.md) ‚Äî track if component is mounted.
    -   [`usePromise`](./docs/usePromise.md) ‚Äî resolves promise only while component is mounted.
    -   [`useLogger`](./docs/useLogger.md) ‚Äî logs in console as component goes through life-cycles.
    -   [`useMount`](./docs/useMount.md) ‚Äî calls `mount` callbacks.
    -   [`useUnmount`](./docs/useUnmount.md) ‚Äî calls `unmount` callbacks.
    -   [`useUpdateEffect`](./docs/useUpdateEffect.md) ‚Äî run an `effect` only on updates.
    -   [`useIsomorphicLayoutEffect`](./docs/useIsomorphicLayoutEffect.md) ‚Äî `useLayoutEffect` that does not show warning when server-side rendering.
    -   [`useDeepCompareEffect`](./docs/useDeepCompareEffect.md), [`useShallowCompareEffect`](./docs/useShallowCompareEffect.md), and [`useCustomCompareEffect`](./docs/useCustomCompareEffect.md) ‚Äî run an `effect` depending on deep comparison of its dependencies  
          
-   [**State**](./docs/State.md)
    -   [`createMemo`](./docs/createMemo.md) ‚Äî factory of memoized hooks.
    -   [`createReducer`](./docs/createReducer.md) ‚Äî factory of reducer hooks with custom middleware.
    -   [`createReducerContext`](./docs/createReducerContext.md) and [`createStateContext`](./docs/createStateContext.md) ‚Äî factory of hooks for a sharing state between components.
    -   [`useDefault`](./docs/useDefault.md) ‚Äî returns the default value when state is `null` or `undefined`.
    -   [`useGetSet`](./docs/useGetSet.md) ‚Äî returns state getter `get()` instead of raw state.
    -   [`useGetSetState`](./docs/useGetSetState.md) ‚Äî as if [`useGetSet`](./docs/useGetSet.md) and [`useSetState`](./docs/useSetState.md) had a baby.
    -   [`useLatest`](./docs/useLatest.md) ‚Äî returns the latest state or props
    -   [`usePrevious`](./docs/usePrevious.md) ‚Äî returns the previous state or props. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/fervent-galileo-krgx6)
    -   [`usePreviousDistinct`](./docs/usePreviousDistinct.md) ‚Äî like `usePrevious` but with a predicate to determine if `previous` should update.
    -   [`useObservable`](./docs/useObservable.md) ‚Äî tracks latest value of an `Observable`.
    -   [`useRafState`](./docs/useRafState.md) ‚Äî creates `setState` method which only updates after `requestAnimationFrame`. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-userafstate--demo)
    -   [`useSetState`](./docs/useSetState.md) ‚Äî creates `setState` method which works like `this.setState`. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/n75zqn1xp0)
    -   [`useStateList`](./docs/useStateList.md) ‚Äî circularly iterates over an array. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/bold-dewdney-pjzkd)
    -   [`useToggle` and `useBoolean`](./docs/useToggle.md) ‚Äî tracks state of a boolean. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/focused-sammet-brw2d)
    -   [`useCounter` and `useNumber`](./docs/useCounter.md) ‚Äî tracks state of a number. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usecounter--demo)
    -   [`useList`](./docs/useList.md) ~and [`useUpsert`](./docs/useUpsert.md)~ ‚Äî tracks state of an array. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/wonderful-mahavira-1sm0w)
    -   [`useMap`](./docs/useMap.md) ‚Äî tracks state of an object. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/quirky-dewdney-gi161)
    -   [`useSet`](./docs/useSet.md) ‚Äî tracks state of a Set. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/bold-shtern-6jlgw)
    -   [`useQueue`](./docs/useQueue.md) ‚Äî implements simple queue.
    -   [`useStateValidator`](./docs/useStateValidator.md) ‚Äî tracks state of an object. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usestatevalidator--demo)
    -   [`useStateWithHistory`](./docs/useStateWithHistory.md) ‚Äî stores previous state values and provides handles to travel through them. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usestatewithhistory--demo)
    -   [`useMultiStateValidator`](./docs/useMultiStateValidator.md) ‚Äî alike the `useStateValidator`, but tracks multiple states at a time. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usemultistatevalidator--demo)
    -   [`useMediatedState`](./docs/useMediatedState.md) ‚Äî like the regular `useState` but with mediation by custom function. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usemediatedstate--demo)
    -   [`useFirstMountState`](./docs/useFirstMountState.md) ‚Äî check if current render is first. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usefirstmountstate--demo)
    -   [`useRendersCount`](./docs/useRendersCount.md) ‚Äî count component renders. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-userenderscount--demo)
    -   [`createGlobalState`](./docs/createGlobalState.md) ‚Äî cross component shared state.[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-createglobalstate--demo)
    -   [`useMethods`](./docs/useMethods.md) ‚Äî neat alternative to `useReducer`. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-usemethods--demo)  
          
-   [**Miscellaneous**]()
    -   [`useEnsuredForwardedRef`](./docs/useEnsuredForwardedRef.md) and [`ensuredForwardRef`](./docs/useEnsuredForwardedRef.md) ‚Äî use a React.forwardedRef safely. [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/demo-%20%20%20%F0%9F%9A%80-green.svg)](https://streamich.github.io/react-use/?path=/story/state-useensuredforwardedref--demo)

  
  
  
  
  
  
  

[**Usage**](./docs/Usage.md) ‚Äî how to import.
